main event: A bright, round light observed multiple times over Lake Erie near Put-in-Bay, Ohio between 1952 and 1958.
interesting points: The object appeared to fade in and out intermittently over several weeks,Observers described it as being brighter than any conventional aircraft,It changed colors from red, green, and blue,Several witnesses including commercial fishermen reported the sightings,The sightings occurred under different weather conditions at night and during the day.
witness description: Commercial fishermen and other residents in the area.
